<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: for(Iterator<E> it = set.iterator(); it.hasNext(); ){
E element = it.next();
makeRepresentative(element);
set.remove(AllPlayersOnSameTeamAs(element));
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can use a for-each loop to iterate through the LinkedHashSet and remove elements as you go. The `Iterator.next()` is not necessary as you can get the next element using the `Iterator.next()` method inside the loop.
